ProductInfo.Features:
GW7216C: 16 Channel H.264 video compression format; support 960H/D1 resolution; HDMI output for better resolution; 4 CH WD1+12 CH WCIF Recroding+16 CH Real-time Playback; iPhone, Android Viewing; New Color Graphical Menu; PTZ Control
GW40WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TVL, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft. IR Distance, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu, Vandal Proof & Water proof
Package Includes:1xGW7216C DVR with 4T HD; 1xGWLED19IN: Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 16 x GW40WD: 1/3" Effio CCD Camera
